Two pillars of the #BankingUnion are up and running:
We have the Single Supervisory Mechanism, which oversees 118 significant banks, 14 of which are in Italy. We have the Single Resolution Mechanism, to resolve banks in an orderly manner in case of necessity #TEHA https://t.co/03nfCWSLJv

We now need to move forward with discussions on the missing elements of the #BankingUnion, namely a common backstop to the Single Resolution Fund, and a European Deposit Insurance Scheme, or #EDIS #TEDA https://t.co/uiNaKRT7ee

EU 🇪🇺 leaders have made a commitment to complete the #BankingUnion.
